content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #223

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Fix 'Home' menu name.

Submitted by Greg Staudenmaier on behalf of @IoanaSingureanu (ioana.singureanu@bookzurman.com )
Chapter/section:
Url:
Type: A-S

Summary: Fix 'Home' menu name.

Comment: The overview of the FHIRcast in the ballot dives into the technical details almost immediatley (which is ok!). However, when I looked for a more high-level overview it is hidden under a 'Home' menu which then expands. I recommend renaming 'Home' to Overview'.

Existing wording: Home
Proposed wording: Overview

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

lbergnehr commented on Issue #223

I think this is a fair point even though it's not strictly related to the spec. and ballot.

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #223

See suggestion of adding abstract in #181

NiklasSvenzen labeled Issue #223

wmaethner commented on Issue #223

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Niklas Svenzen

Disposition: Not related
Disposition Comment: Is related to 181 where we describe adding an abstract to the spec and will also update the Home name to Overview

:+1: For: 13
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
